aulddragon
Title
column7: Description

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 001 - Choppy Mouse Movements, Ho!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We start out with character creation, which I don't go into as much depth as I did in the SSI games. To speed everything up, I pregenerated Elmindreda, the character I will be using in BG.

Unfortunately, mouse laggyness and video problems in episode 2 get the better of me. Looks like I'll have to investigate some other recording methods besides Camstudio (which works fine for old games, but not so much for newer ones). Hopefully I'll get everything worked out this weekend and I can get some more episodes done for next week.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 002 - Why are people trying to kill me?!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

After equipping myself at the Inn, I speak with some of the people within Candlekeep. In two empty buildings, people try to kill me!  What could be going on?!

I'm using Fraps, which works a lot better for this than Camstudio. However, the files are uncompressed, so I'll probably continue to use Camstudio for other recordings.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 003 - Nooo!  Father!!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Oh no, what shall we do! We're all alone now!

Well, for a few minutes until Imoen joins my party. Woohoo!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 004 - I'm not doing so well here...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Well. Not much to say here, other than.. wow, I suck!

I think you can expect more of this throughout this Let's Play!

column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We enter the central Rochester Castle-like keep of the Friendly Arm Inn, and search out Gorion's friends. We then decide to do some hobgoblin hunting!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 006 - Beregost!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We make our way to Beregost, finding a wrecked caravan by the road and a random kid in the middle of the wilderness...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 007 - Security is a bit light here...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We get into a couple fights in town, and people just stand around doing nothing. This town makes me feel very safe!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 008 - Bothering Beregosters
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We wander around a bit more in Beregost, realize the huge spider quest is over our heads, and annoy Jaheira. All in a day's work!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 009 - Dangerous Roads Ahead
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head south towards Nashkel, slaughtering kobolds, hobgoblins, and bandits along the way. Woohoo!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 010 - Nashkel!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We begin to explore the town of Nashkel, starting with a very boring farm outside of town. Then we visit the inn and the obligatory assassin. Wee!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 011 - GO FOR THE EYES, BOO!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

BEST CHARACTER IN THE GAME!

Plus, Spelljammer references ftw. I loves me some Spelljammer.

I wish Boo was actually Woolly Rupert in disguise, though.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 012 - In which I completely miss the entrance to the mine...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

I begin searching for the entrance to the mines, and completely miss the entrance.

Kieran would LOVE the minecarts here...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 013 - Apparently I suck at fighting Kobolds. Awesome!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Yeah, there are multiple reloads here. I feel ashamed.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 014 - Stop dying, Minsc!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Minsc, stop dying against measely kobolds! You're forcing me to reload!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 015 - Kobolds going commando...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue deeper into the mines, and discover a Kobold Commando! Rather annoying, he is. We then get to fight some oozes.

Minsc dies multiple times, as usual.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 016 - Cleansing the Mines
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We encounter Mulahey, the villain behind the weakening of the iron. We have some good conversation, drinks, share stories... then completely slaughter him! Weeee! It's so much fun to be good!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 017 - Back to town for our reward!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

After cleansing the mines, we make our way back to town. This will be an uneventful trip, right?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 018 - Off to the Gnoll Fortress!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finally decide to help Minsc save his ward, and so head off to the Gnoll Fortress. The journey is long (hahaha, okay, it's not) and hard (Ohnoes, Xvarts! Whatever shall I do! Maybe... kill them all? sounds good to me!), but we finally make it!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 019 - Let's go slaughter some gnolls!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

A LOT of gnolls as it turns out. But then we make Minsc happy.

No, we do not find a Two-headed Lernaean Phase Doppleganger Giant Space Hamster mate for Boo.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 020 - Sideways flying eagles are awesome.
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

What the heck is with the respawn rate in this game anyway? At least it's more experience. Anyway, we finish exploring the Gnoll fortress, and slay lots and lots of gnolls and xvarts.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 021 - Looking for Bandits in all the wrong places
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Having rescued Dynaheir, it is now time to go find these bandits who are harassing the caravans!

And by "look for bandits" I mean wander around aimlessly slaughtering things. Wee!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 022 - Bandits Bandits Everywhere!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finally find an area full of bandits, and proceed to slaughter them. Fun times!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 023 - Beware the crazed druids!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

While wandering through the forest, we are attacked by an insane druid. We then get to kill the guy who set him up!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 024 - A Friendly Ghoul?
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

This is an eventful episode! First we get slaughtered by phase spiders, then we get slaughtered by basilisks, and then we encounter a friendly ghoul (who makes killing some basilisks a lot easier!). What fun!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 025 - Basilisks, Basilisks, Everywhere!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

In this episode, I make multiple attempts to kill a bunch of basilisks and the gnome who is controlling them!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 026 - Looting Halfling Villages!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We wander into a Halfling village, and promptly loot it. We then find some catacombs beneath a Temple of Helm, and promptly loot that too (while slaughtering the kobolds we find within)!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 027 - Slowdown in the Catacombs and Unintentional Quest Completion!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to explore the labyrinthine catacombs beneath the halfling village, and encounter some Ghost Knights of Massive Slowdown, which leads to a random unintentional quest completion! Then we encounter the one who masterminded the harassing of the village, and leads to another random unintentional quest completion!

Elmindreda and Party: Bumbling Into Victory Since 1368 DR!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 028 - Bumbling into assassins!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Continuing the theme, we bumble into a party of assassins who want me dead! It takes a few tries, but we manage to obliterate them eventually!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 029 - Undead Abound
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We detour to Bereghost to sell some stuff and take care of that spiderhouse, then begin to wander in the middle of the night, and slay quite a few ghoulish creatures.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 030 - Harassing Hermits!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue our wandering exploration of some map sections, and encounter a hermit who really gets on Elmindreda's nerves, and does she ever give him a piece of her mind!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 031 - Searching the Carnival Area
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We get around to going back to the Carnival area and gathering stuff we missed, along with killing various monsters and silly wizard types.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 032 - Greywolf and Prism
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

This time we return to the Nashkel Mine area and find an obsessed sculptor and the bounty hunter sent to hunt him. We make short work of the jerk, and get a nice sword!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 033 - Sick Guys take up an item slot!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We encounter a woman with a sick companion, whom we must take to the temple of Garl Glittergold at the Friendly Arm Inn. He is an item!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 034 - Ogre Battle!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We wander into a map section with a large number of Ogres, half-ogres, and other such creatures. We proceed to slaughter them indiscriminately. It's good to be good!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 035 - A Half-Ogre Tribe?
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to do our best to wipe out all monsters and evil humanoids in existence, by encountering a "tribe" of four half-ogres! We get a nice reward for our trouble.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 036 - Packed full of AWESOME
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

In this episode we first encounter a small group of named bandits, xvarts trying to butcher a cow, a crazy Ilmater evangelist, A bombastic overconfident swordsman, an insane mage, and an Oni in a Bottle named Kahrk! Talk about an episode packed full of awesome!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 037 - So THIS is where we were supposed to enter...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

After wandering around a bit more, we finally find where we were SUPPOSED to enter the Firewine Ruins. Oops!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 038 - A Return to the Friendly Arm Inn
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We do some more old sidequest stuff and buy magic items!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 039 - Protecting Evil Priestesses!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We encounter and protect a Drow priestess who has foresworn her former evil goddess, Lolth, in favor of... evil goddess Shar. Yeah...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 040 - I hate Black Talon Elites
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

I haven't recorded all the times I've gotten slaughtered by them. And they give crap XP too!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 041 - Slaughterer of Beasts!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

In this episode, we wander around some more, and find a LOT of animals to slaughter!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 042 - Exploring Beneath Ulcaster
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We explore the ruins of a small village, and find an entrance to some underground chambers! Time to loot and explore it~!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 043 - Random named undead FTW
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finish up under Ulcaster and continue to explore the environs, when we get attacked by a random named Skeleton! We make short work of him, of course.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 044 - A New Sidequest!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We return to the temple of Lathander, and get a quest to slay the mad priest Bassilus! We then go sell more crap in Beregost.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 045 - THIS BIRD IS FOUL!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We rescue a chicken possessed by fowl beings from the lower planes!

(Well not really, but this sequence is AWESOME even without it.)

Oh, and we also find the mad cleric Bassilus and slaughter him after a couple attempts.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 046 - Watch for Wolves!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue wandering around the area inhabited by Bassilus and The Chicken, and despite the warning, we find many more hobgoblins than wolves...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 047 - Well, THIS isn't the Wizard's Tower...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

So after TWO failed attempts on this map section, let's see if I can do better! We get into some pretty nasty battles here, probably the toughest we've persistently faced so far (so discounting me running from the Basilisks and the phase spiders). Sirines and flesh golems are evil!

(The next part of this game is being really slow to upload....)

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 048 - Finally looting the Flesh Golem cave!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finally clear out the cave, after a little bit of a snafu at the end of the last episode. We then continue to explore the area, and frighten a fortune teller so much she attacks us!  Woohoo!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 049 - Stupid Respawning Hobgoblins
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

The hobgoblins inhabiting the rest of this map are REALLY getting on my nerves....

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 050 - Dispelling the Polymorph
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finally find Melicamp's master, and after a harrowing quest, we are able to dispel the dire enchantment upon him!

At least, that's what I'm telling people in the tavern....

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 051 - Futile Cave Searching
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

I head back to the Gnoll Fortress area to search for a cave I was told I missed, and I find it, but not the item it supposedly contains. So I take my disappointment out on a Mountain Bear!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 052 - A River Runs Through It
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to explore a map section with a nice river... and a ton of Ogres.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 053 - Larry, Darryl, and Darryl
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We meet Larry, Darryl, and Darryl. I did not realize they were famous, and miss out on an autograph. Curse you cloistered life!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 054 - What the hell kind of puppy is that?!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

While wondering around, we find Albert's lost puppy. Who is Albert to have that kind of "puppy"?!

Oh. Oh.... That's... not so good...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 055 - Stupid spells preventing me from resting!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

During a battle, I cast Skull Trap, but it does not go off. So while it is sitting there, I can't rest anywhere on the map.  Craaaaaaap....

Oh, and we help Drizzt and watch as he causes gnolls to explode by touch...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 056 - Annoying Ogres
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Ogres are really annoying.

We continue to wander around, but don't find a whole lot left on this map.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 057 - Decrazing Brage
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We find Captain Brage of Nashkel, and manage to answer his riddle, thus allowing us to cure his curse!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 058 - Idol Talk
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We find an archeological site, but unfortunately, this one DOES have a curse, of sorts.

Stupid Talos and his ancient cults.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 059 - Kiss of Death
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Word to the wise: If some watery tart wants to kiss you, whip out the magic missiles.

This goes doubly at anime cons.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 060 - Mauling Bears
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue our wilderness explorations, and come across two local Bear Bands, planning how to wreak havoc on innocent adventurers. So we maul them to death.

We also find a pompous fop planning to throw himself from a cliff. Unfortunately, we stop him.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 061 - The Anti-Stoner Party
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

With Protection from Petrification, we can now take on the basilisks that slaughtered us so long ago! And yet, no one gains a level....

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 062 - Oh What a Tangled Web We Weave
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Now that we have eliminated the basilisks, it is time to take on the other opponents who slaughtered us! This time we get to face nasty spiders! f only we had Sting...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 063 - Where's the industrial strength insecticide when you need it?
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We wander into a new area, only to get slaughtered multiple times by giant bugs. Curse you arthropoda!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 064 - *GASP* Advancing the plot?!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Yep! But not until the very end...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 065 - The Bandit Camp!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finally find the bandit camp! I'm sure you all know what this means, right?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 066 - Slaughtering the Subordinates
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We enter the Bandit Leader's hut, only to find him not there! How dare he not be around for me to kill him?! Let's take it out on his subordinates, shall we?

Plus, looting! Woohoo!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 067 - Dream Sequence!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We return to the Bandit Camp area, just in time to get a dream sequence! Yay advancing the plot!

Boo getting Slow Poison as an ability...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 068 - Militant Druids in the Cloakwood
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head to the Cloakwood and begin to explore it, coming across a noble hunting party threatened by a troupe of militant druid. The druids, of course, refuse to negotiate, so I slaughter them! Woohoo!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 069 - Spiders... Why did it have to be Spiders...
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Exploring further into the Cloakwood, we encounter a young man whose brother entered the woods to slay spiders, and hasn't come back. Anyone wanna take a wager he's a corpse now?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 070 - What the hell is THAT?!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We enter the domed wasp-nest-like structure, only to find something truly horrible and disgusting: Centeol. We then proceed to die multiple times.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 071 - Shadowy Druids
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

While wondering through the Cloakwood, we encounter a number of "Shadow Druids" who really don't like Jaheira. We slaughter them, of course! Too bad they're worthless fights...

We also continue our crusade against the villainous bears! They will not take over the world on MY watch!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 072 - Wyverns and Hamadryads and Bears, oh my!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Why the heck is a Hamadryad attacking me?!  I'm saving her forest from the dire threat of BEARS!

Once we slay the poor misguided treewench, we find a cave of wyverns. It takes us a couple tries, but I manage to slaughter them! And then I make another goof...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 073 - To the Mine!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We do some housekeeping back at Bereghost, and then return to the Cloakwood to find this iron mine we've heard about.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 074 - Pathetic Guards
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Into the poorly defended mines! The only real resistance we encounter is a group of mercenaries in the outer bailey. All the other guards are wusses. What fun!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 075 - Nothing Beats a Pre-emptive Fireball
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Oh look, a meeting room full of guards and we just popped out of a secret door. Fireball~~

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 076 - Looting Guard Quarters!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Onto level three, where we find a lot of treasure in the guard quarters. Man, it is going to be a pain getting all this back to town.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 077 - Slaughtering Hobgoblins
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

On the third level, still, where frequently respawning hobgoblins become quite the annoyance.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 078 - Crushing the Operation
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We crush the operation of the mine, and flood it, after looting everything of value. Next up: Baldur's Gate itself!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 079 - Assisting Evil Little Girls
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We encounter the evil priestess we were told about near the Ankheg hole. After goofing it up slightly, we decide to help her against those who set us upon her. So much fun to be helping evil priestesses!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 080 - Island Prison
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Talking to Shandalar in Ulgoth's Beard sends us to an island far out at sea, where wizards have been trapped.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 081 - Prison Break
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Now that we have the cloak, let's pacify the rest of the prisoners before escaping!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 082 - Farm of the Living Dead
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

After doing some exploring and selling off of excess winter wolf pelts, we find a farm beset by zombies! I'm so scared.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 083 - Entering Baldur's Gate!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finally make our way into Baldur's Gate! And what do we do when we first enter? Visit the thieves' guild!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 084 - Interrupting Wizards
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

So after looting the thieves' guild, and wandering around a bit, we visit some wizards in the middle of SERIOUS WORKINGS! They don't take kindly to it, so we are forced to slaughter them. Wee!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 085 - Stumbling and Bumbling into Thievery and Death
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to wander around town and get into trouble in various houses and buildings. Woohoo!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 086 - The Iron Throne
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We find the Iron Throne, and decide to slaughter the lot of them!

It doesn't go so well.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 087 - Dopple Vacation
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Aldeth Sashenstar, the man we rescued some time ago in the Cloakwood, asks us to investigate his companions in the Merchant Consortium, who have been acting suspiciously.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 088 - Dopplegang
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Investigating the Seven Suns trading coster, we discover that the place is crawling with dopplegangers as well. Our job is clear!

And if anyone knows where Scar is supposed to be, let me know...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 089 - Bugfix
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

After replaying the last video offscreen to avert the bug I encounter, we get our rewards for cleaning up the Seven Suns Coster. After that, we continue to explore the city!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 090 - What Has He Got In His Pocketses?
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head to the temple of Umberlee to get the corpse of a Tymoran priest's son, and return it to him. Following that, we pick the pocket of the boy's friend for a nice reward!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 091 - Secretly Poisoned!?
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We meet a partner of an assassin who has secretly poisoned us! He needs us to do a fetch quest for him, of course, involving helping the Umberlant high priestess. Stupid fetch quests.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 092 - Assassin Smashin'
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We hunt down the second assassin, and after slaughtering an Ogre who seems to know us, we find him. And smash his face in.

Do I need his antidote item, or can I sell it?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 093 - Confronting Yago
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head to the ship of pleasures to confront the wizard Yago and get his spellbook.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 094 - How Rude!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We enter an inn, and are accosted by some very rude adventurers. We teach them a lesson.

By slaughtering them, of course.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 095 - Redistributing the Wealth
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We investigate the mansion in the northwest of town, and discovering gobs of cash lying around, we decide to redistribute it all.

Into our pockets, of course.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 096 - Freeing Faeries
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We enter Ragefast's home to free the nymph he has captured! After doing so, we decide to report to the wizard Ramazith, who wanted her for himself, and find he had cruel intentions planned. Justice demands we slaughter this villain!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 097 - Shipwrecked!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We sail to the island on the sea chart we got in Baldur's Gate, but our ship is dashed upon the reefs and cliffs of the island! Luckily, there are some (somewhat) friendly villagers who are willing to help us, if we clear some monsters from the northern part of the island first...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 098 - Warwelf?
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head to the northern half of the island, only to find it swarming with monsters who love to rip our faces off.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 099 - Into Balduran's Ship!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We begin our foray into Balduran's Ship, and end up facing off against large numbers Wolfweres. Amazing how the wolfweres on the other levels don't notice us slaughtering their friends below them every day...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 100 - Item Overload
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Wow, 100 episodes! This is quite the milestone!

We are running low on inventory space after these three levels of Balduran's Ship and all the wolfwere slaughter. And I'm not even done with the island!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 101 - Clearing Some Quests
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head back to town to turn in some items and quests we've completed, and get another to slay a sirine queen and find someone's brother. Our plans derail there...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 102 - Dying to the Sirine Queen Repeatedly
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Woohoo, dying repeatedly! Best episode ever!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 103 - Ungrateful!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We inform the chieftain of the village that the beasts are dead, but rather than giving us a reward and sending us on our way, they attempt to kill us!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 104 - Wolf's Den
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to make our way through the secret warren of caves, trying to find a way to escape from this accursed island.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 105 - We're Going to Need a Bath
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Returning to Baldur's Gate, we descend into the sewers. Why is it always sewers?  We're going to need a bath after this.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 106 - Royal Sewage
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to explore the sewers, finding a sewer worker clearly consorting with a group of kobold commandos; we let him live this time, but slaughter the kobolds. We then encounter some sort of slime creature that calls itself the Sewer King. We give it a tribute of death.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 107 - Extradimensional Sewers
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to wander the sewers, discovering that the entrances don't seem to match the surface. Clearly these sewers feature extradimensional folding!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 108 - I Give In
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Viewers definitely want to see me get slaughtered, I mean, visit Durlag's Tower, so after taking care of the Sewer quest, we head off to do enjoy our deaths!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 109 - Entering the Tower
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We make it through the outer areas of the Durlag's Tower, and then begin to explore the interior. And we have fun with traps!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 110 - Ascending the Tower
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue searching the Tower of Durlag for delicious loots, encountering a number of enemies, including a ghost, another looter, and a villainous vixen!

Also, I will be switching back to posting Baldur's Gate on Sundays starting a week from tomorrow. I will be doing single hour long episodes rather than two half hour episodes.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 111 - Dungeoneering
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head down into the dungeons below Durlag's Tower, where we sit down to tea with some nice, friendly skeletal warriors, phase spiders, and flesh golems.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 112 - Stupid Traps
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

What's better than lots of traps? How about traps we can't disarm!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 113 - Nasty Dwarveses!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

After realizing we need to solve some riddles to get to the lower level, we enjoy multuple attempts at defeating the guardian dwarves!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 114 - Door Puzzles of Doom!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Door Puzzles!  I hate them. Why can't I just bash the doors down? MINSC SMASH!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 115 - Heroes, Forward!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Forward and fight these Wyverns for us! And when you're done, we will slaughter you. Deal?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 116 - Skeletons and Slimes
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We find a series of rooms with particularly annoying enemies in this part of Durlag's Tower, and then spend time baiting easy monsters with nasty weapons!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 117 - Checkmate
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finish up the current floor, only to get teleported to a giant game of Battle Chess...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 118 - Super Ghouls and Ghasts
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue to explore an area filled with slimy, acidic floors and fight off hordes of ghouls. In addition, we find tons of items we can't pick up. Yay!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 119 - Answer Me These Questions Three
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

It's testing time, and me without my Number 2 Pencil! It looks like we are pretty close to the end of this dungeon, though, and soon we will be free! At least, I hope so...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 120 - Demonknight
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We enter the den of the Demonknight, who thanks us for cleaning the tower of monsters and traps. We say "You're welcome!" with a great many stabs.

What the heck IS the Demonknight, anyway?

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 121 - Back to the main quest!
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

Having finished Durlag's Tower, we decide to get back to our actual mission. On to the Iron Throne!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 122 - Into the Central Keep
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We head into the central keep to begin investigating the strange goings-on around here.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 123 - The Catacombs
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We are falsely accused of the murder of the leaders of the Iron Throne, but luckily an old friend rescues us... sort of. We are set "free" into the monster filled catacombs beneath Candlekeep.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 124 - Leaving the Catacombs
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We finish making our way through the catacombs of Candlekeep, slaughtering dopplegangers and skeletons along the way.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 125 - The Search for Sarevok
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We follow the stars on our trek back to Baldur's Gate to locate Sarevok, starting with the Iron Throne Headquarters.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 126 - Coronation Street
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We hunt down Sarevok's assassins in Baldur's Gate, and acquire their invitation to his coronation ceremony. Time to crash a party!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 127 - Down Down to Sarevok's Town
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

We continue our pursuit of Sarevok through a maze infested with traps, undead, and slimes, and find ourselves in the ruins of a city underground. One wonders how this city could be there in a cave if it were once a surface city...

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: Let's Play "Baldur's Gate" Part 128 - An Unexpected End
column7:
Let's Play the first of the Infinity Engine AD&D games: "Baldur's Gate"!

The final confrontation with Sarevok is at hand! Can Elmindreda defeat her power-mad sibling?

Despite a list of complaints about the game, I really enjoyed it. Thanks for joining Elmindreda on her adventure!
